website_summaries.verdict: Men who want to carry a wallet in a front pocket will appreciate this model's unique shape because it's designed like the contours of front pockets, which also earns it the top spot on our shortlist.
pros: Tops the pack for the patented shape that's constructed specifically to fit into the front pockets of men's pants and jeans
Other features include bison leather craftsmanship, bifold design, and RFID blocking
cons: Some consumers may prefer more than the 3 card slots provided

customer_reviews.title: Quite possibly the best wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this wallet for about a week and it is on course to be the best wallet I have ever owned. It is slim, compact, yet roomy enough to carry my five credit/debit cards, and my driver's licenses and two other forms of ID. The compartment for cash is very adequate. The best feature is the design to carry in my front pocket (my chiropractor thanks you). Sometimes I wonder if I am even carrying this wallet and have to check to see if I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Leather Front Pocket Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding choice for me. I love the unique natural grain of the bison leather. Don't expect yours to look exactly like a photo...every well-made wallet has character, and this is exceptional, made in the USA. I continue to get compliments on the look and design of the front pocket style. I feel more secure, and my back has never felt better. The RFID blocking is highly functional and unobtrusive. I only had room for my driver's license, an alternate ID and 3 other cards. If you need to carry more than that, big man, then maybe you should get a purse.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stark

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after hearing my husband complain about having to "wear" a wallet in his back pocket...just uncomfortable. In a crowded place, he always moves his wallet to his front pocket to insure that he is safe from pick-pockets. So, I bought this on the chance that he might not like it...or that he might...(relief)...he likes it and loves the heavy bison leather from which it is made. He says that it takes a bit to get used to having it in his front pocket, but that he really likes it. Quality is great and he is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Rogue wallets are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first rogue wallet years ago, and it held up under the arduous conditions I afflicted on it daily. Just purchased my second rogue in the bison leather. It’s perfect as expected. I’m a loyal customer for life and have pointed my family and friends to rogue.
customer_reviews.author: White Guard

customer_reviews.title: A great everyday wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I started using the front pocket wallet for travel. I then found it was also useful in commuting to and from work and then everyday use for added security and comfort. This wallet is fantastic holding 6 credit cards and room for other information as well as cash. The bison hide looks great and lasts. I really like this front pocket wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Henry1130

customer_reviews.title: stiff but will soften over time
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our son for his January birthday and he loves it and has thanked us many times since receiving it. He not only likes that it's for his front pocket and has credit card protection but also that it's a Maine product.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: It is a good birthday present.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son in law. I don't know whether he likes it or not. We thought it is good enough for a birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wallet. Will make a great gift for Christmas. I have bought from this company before and will certainly buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: Second one I purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. Got one several years ago on the advice of my doctor because of the pain of having a back ache. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Garland R Rhyne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my boyfriend's. He loved the front pocket design, it just doesn't hold much. 🙁 But overall it's a win! 4 stars only because we expected it to hold more. Great quality and design! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift. The recipient has not received it yet. It is a replacement fro his old front pocket wallet. The wallet itself is not as shiny as it appears in the photo. More of a nubuck finish to the leather. I would have preferred a smoother leather myself but I am not the one carrying it. It also down not have a many card slots as I am used to. We will see how he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper in CA

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wallet for travel
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for father's day! It's too small for every day use but perfect for those special occasions when you only need a few items in a wallet.
customer_reviews.author: fit4everlisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, well-made, room for plenty of cash, 6 credit cards, other areas to store small papers.
customer_reviews.author: GARY55

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CONCEPT
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the way it fits in my pocket. I feel more secure with my wallet up front. It helps my hips by not carrying a wallet in the back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: No more sciatica pain and it is great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and made in Maine, works well and I have no more sciatica from a back pocket wallet. I bought this one for a friend , but I must say I bought mine on Ebay for $30.00 less a month or so earlier. The luck of the draw.
customer_reviews.author: Darrold D.

customer_reviews.title: quality wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands second front pocket wallet. The first one lasted many, many years, so we hope this one does as well. Looks like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: DeDi

customer_reviews.title: Best front pocket wallet on the market
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best front pocket wallet I have ever had. Very compact.
customer_reviews.author: frank jordan

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be very good quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Finally wore out my old wallet and got this one to replace it. Looks to be very good quality leather. Not too stiff. Very comfortable. This is my 2nd Rogue Wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Evil Bucket

customer_reviews.title: Top notch wallet at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, thick leather outer and card pockets perfect size. Been a Bosca wallet man for 25 years until I got this, and I believe it is superior in material and craftsmanship. Certainly a better bargain.
customer_reviews.author: SirWill90

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to replace one that was worn out. He hasn't stopped raving about it. The leather is smooth with a luxurious feel and the wallet stays slim, even when loaded with 'stuff '. It is comfortable to wear in the front pocket and doesn't bother him when seated.
customer_reviews.author: S. Milner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, nice quality leather. My husband switched to a front pocket wallet because his Dr. told him his hip and leg pain was due to pressure his back pocket wallet was putting on a nerve.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Two is better than one.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a brown wallet and liked it so I bought a black one.
customer_reviews.author: William Harper

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is everything it was stated as being Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is everything it was stated as being Amazon sells it for much lower than the manufacturers. It takes a little while to get used to having the wallet bulge in your front pocket but it might make you more popular with the ladies! I purchased this wallet to get the back pocket wallet from causing me back pain. The only drawback to this wallet is it only has 3 card slots but that could keep you from unnessary spending .
customer_reviews.author: Warren C. Higgs

customer_reviews.title: and he has never ever made a suggestion as to what he would like to get for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I gave the wallet only 4 stars because it is very stiff, but I believe with use, it will soften up. I am doing some Christmas shopping, and he has never ever made a suggestion as to what he would like to get for Christmas, but he travels so much that he did ask for a front pocket wallet this year. I feel the price and the quick delivery of the wallet is a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ruth Berdine

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was too small for my husband's needs. Will order the six pocket one.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice. My husband likes it but it wants to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice. My husband likes it but it wants to bend some in the front pockets- and That is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: G. M

customer_reviews.title: Front pocket is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: This is like my 5th Rogue wallet. I just love these things. All my friends are carrying them now.
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Front pocket is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one for my husband. He will not carry any other wallet, he really likes not having a wallet in his back pocket and sitting on it!
customer_reviews.author: Dtram

customer_reviews.title: Quality, pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality !! Makes a huge difference on my bad back. Glad I made the purchase. Bison is a little stronger than leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, thin, RFID blocking - this would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Rugged, thin, RFID blocking - this would be my wallet for life except I am heeding the call to clamshell aluminum wallet - a TruVirtu Cash and Cards Oyster is on its way from Germany.
customer_reviews.author: Antiochian

customer_reviews.title: Well built wallet for those who appreciate a minimalist approach.
customer_reviews.text: Designed for the front pockets, it is ideal if you only need to carry a minimum number of cards plus cash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice all around, everything fits great, can hardly tell it's in my pocket. Love it. After several months of use, it still looks new and has loosened up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Walet
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is the leather is so stiff that it take a few months to soften it up, well made, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: jrsatt

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed. This wallet is small and only has 3 credit card slots. It's very thin, so I don't think it will hold much. It's a Christmas gift for my boss, and I'm just not 100% I'm going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband... I like the wallet myself but the real review is yet to be said... Still waiting on husband to put it in his pocket...
customer_reviews.author: Sher Fox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to organize and fits perfectly in his front pocket
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband who loves the wallet! Easy to organize and fits perfectly in his front pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be well made. I have only ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be well made. I have only had it for a week now . Still trying to get used to carrying it in my front pocket. Has enough room to carry most of my cards and money. Will have to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: A real front pants pocket billfold tha actually works!
customer_reviews.text: It has a pocket for dollar bills, more slots for credit cards, etc. and stll is very flat and stable in my front pants pocket. A quality product that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Henkel

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, well made.
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with the wallet. Nothing bad to say really. My goal for the new wallet was to downsize what I was carrying and keep in my front pocket. Both achieved.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan a

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Husband says too hard to get card out of holders. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Slimline!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is durable and compact. It takes a little getting used to because of the fact that you can't fit everything in it, but you get used to carrying just the necessities.
customer_reviews.author: Hana   Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I have a feeling that I'll like it even more as it gets broken in
customer_reviews.text: Definitely dig the wallet. I've kept my wallet in my front pocket for years and I've always had to deal with money clips that didn't work well, or credit cards that get ruined. No more. I have a feeling that I'll like it even more as it gets broken in. LOVE the fact that it's made in Maine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had the original wallet from Rogue like this and it wore out after a few years
customer_reviews.text: I had the original wallet from Rogue like this and it wore out after a few years. Nothing unexpected about the wear. It was just time for a new one. I like this one and hope it wears as well. Delivery was on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F Maltenfort

customer_reviews.title: Great front.pocket wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for those of us who prefer a front pocket product. Quite stiff in the early stages. The cut of wallet could have been even a millimeter or two longer for bills. But, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREEAT wallet. Only drawback is after months to angle ...
customer_reviews.text: GREEAT wallet. Only drawback is after months to angle corner bends a bit. It also cant hold a lot, but this is really a positive in disguise.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and Nice leather - I love that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and Nice leather - I love that it is Made in the USA... but as with other reviews, there is not a lot of space for cards.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: No more lower back/hip pain
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels good. This wallet fits in my pocket nicely. Wish I'd thought about buying one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our third of these - my husband will never own another wallet!
customer_reviews.author: shellyplus2

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. I really haven't had the opportunity to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Glen R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy - Front Pocket Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I've found the Front Pocket Wallet to be an excellent buy. The wallet fits comfortably in my front pocket and I feel it is more secure and safer.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lebeis

customer_reviews.title: Great front pocket wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in my jeans and a good looking bison leather wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good looking wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wallet and am glad I went with the bison leather. Even after a few weeks of wear the leather looks very nice and definitely holds up well. Cheaper leather wallets I have bought have had the leather fraying and coming apart after a few months of work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the wallet. I was afraid because it wasn't a "label" like the Coach wallet he's used for years, he might not care for it as much. Wrong! This fits in his front pocket WAY better and he loves the feel of the bison leather. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Barshop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves it. Has back trouble and this has taken some of the pressure off.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Reeser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, front pocket wallet that has the RFID protection built in, yet comfortable in pocket.
customer_reviews.author: N. Caronna

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it. Fits perfectly in his front pocket
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it. Fits perfectly in his front pocket. Holds quite a few additional cards. Looks well made...time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Snedecor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife who goes to the gym and doesn't like lugging her purse with her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Novel Wallet
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wallet! Thinks it is comfortable to carry and makes sense to wear
customer_reviews.author: susan ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: Fixs right in your front pocket. I feel a lot safer with it there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for this product
customer_reviews.text: If you have Athritis in your hands don't buy this item Too stiff and hard
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to put credit cards in and remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana brown

customer_reviews.title: Says it is the most comfortable wallet he as ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it as gift for my father. He absolutely loves it. Says it is the most comfortable wallet he as ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Fits comfortably in pocket with $$s and few credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Best

customer_reviews.title: I like the wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like the wallet. It's the second one of that designed I have owed. A little disappointed in it's overall size..... credit cards are a bit to large to fit in the slots. Hoping it will stretch a bit over time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the wallet is a little stiff and thinner than the ...
customer_reviews.text: the wallet is a little stiff and thinner than the one it is replacing but is actually what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great. Liked it so much that I gifted one to my son for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It's Great.
customer_reviews.text: After 40 years of carrying my wallet in my back pocket and dealing with numbness and discomfort this is a real comfortable solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so good. I like the feeling of security the wallet ...
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to a wallet in my pants front pocket, but, so far, so good. I like the feeling of security the wallet gives me.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaDart

customer_reviews.title: Men's frpnt pocket wallet
customer_reviews.text: For the price it didn't look like much but I guess we will see in time if it holds up. Not sure how durable it is yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Rivet

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best wallet ever . Still carry my first one . I've had it for 5 years with hardly any wear. Only bought a new one because I wanted black and they didn't offer it in bison when I bought the first one
customer_reviews.author: kevin bell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made but i found it to awkward to put money in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: better than expected quality
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping... better than expected quality. I finally found a wallet that I can comfortably wear in my front pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice. It provides some RFID protection, although RFID signals can be picked up at close ranges.
customer_reviews.author: Scarolina

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst front pocket wallet ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst front pocket wallet ever!! It is WAY to big if you wear blue jeans!! The best is the Dopp front pocket wallet-- I had to try another style-- big mistake. Also the cost is way too expensive. My opinion--DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Carry in Front Pocket and  Provides RFID Protection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a replacement for 5 to 6 year old Rouge front pocket wallet. The old Rouge could still be used, but had become stretched due to my carrying too many cards. Will not make the same mistake with this one. Really like the way Rogue's wallets fit into front pocket with a low profile and keeps me from sitting on a back pocket wallet. Also provides RFID protection. A great wallet made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba SE

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift for son with lower back problems. The idea is that you don't sit on your wallet, which helps your posture and can reduce pain. While somewhat pricey, I'm hoping the bison wears as well as it feels.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Tipsword

product_meta.title: Front Pocket Wallet by Rogue Industries - Genuine American Leather with RFID Block, Holds 6 Cards - Black
product_meta.description: Made in Maine, this genuine bison leather is durable, supple and smooth. With a patented curved edge and only one-quarter of an inch thick, the Rogue Wallet will fit comfortably and securely in your front pocket.
feature_bullets: Genuine American Bison Leather with RFID Block
Features a Full Size Banknote Divider, 3 Card Slots, and ID Pocket
Holds Up to 6 Credit Cards, Organized Comfortably in your Front Pocket
No Two Bison Hides Are Alike - Each Wallet May Have Small Natural Variations Making Each One Unique
